attributes.action: No Business Closures for any business - No Job losses due to Covid19
attributes.additional_details: We paid our way, now its time for government to support all its people and businesses with full financial grants, no loans just instant grants to keeps us all in business and in work now.
attributes.background: We want all businesses to be financially supported so that no business closes, no hassle,  just instant financial support so nobody losses a job due Covid 19. No T&C's just financially support now, grants not loans.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to support businesses by providing them with grants, but it's not clear how you want the Government to do this or how much grants should be for.

We have published a number of petitions calling on the Government to provide financial support to individuals and businesses. You can see all open petitions relating to coroanvirus here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=covid-19

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
